description:
Palmolive Naturals Milk & Honey Liquid Hand Wash Soap is 95% natural origin and a rich and creamy hand wash that removes germs for healthy, beautiful hands and contains NO Parabens Phthalates or Alcohol

Made with 100% natural honey and moisturising milk, Palmolive Naturals Liquid Hand Wash soap contains mild cleansers that effectively remove germs while retaining your skin's natural moisture.Â 

The rich and creamy formula is clinically proven to remove germs from skin while leaving hands feeling soft and smooth.

A light and sweet honey scent with a smooth milky notes, it feels like the warm sun on a cold day.

What we leave out is as important as what we put in
- No Parabens.
- No Phthalates.
- No mineral oil.
- No alcohol.
- No Silicones.
- No soap.
- No gluten.
- No BPA.
- No Animal Derived ingredients.

Pack Size: 1L refill & save - enough for 4 x 250mL pumps.

Please recycle! This bottle is recyclable. Made with 65% less plastic, it's better for your wallet and better for the planet.

Palmolive Naturals is perfect for the bathroom, kitchen and laundry.

MOISTURISING HAND WASH: Palmolive Naturals Liquid Hand Wash Soap is 95% natural origin and uses a moisturising formula which contains 100 percent natural honey and moisturising milk

SOFT AND SMOOTH HANDS: Palmolive Naturals Liquid Hand Wash Soap removes germs and is pH balanced for healthy, beautiful skin.

LIGHT AND SWEET HONEY SCENT: with a smooth milky notes, it feels like the warm sun on a cold day.

FREE FROM: Parabens, phthalates, mineral oil, alcohol, silicones, soap, gluten, BPA, and animal derived ingredients

REFILL AND SAVE: with our 1L Palmolive Naturals Liquid Hand Wash Soap enough for 4 x 250mL pumps.
name: Palmolive Naturals Liquid Hand Wash Soap Milk & Honey Refill 1L
